name: daytime
content:

B2 the period between the time when the sun rises and the time it goes down, or the part of the day that is neither evening nor night: I tend to sleep in/during the daytime and study at night. a regular daytime job a daytime phone number daytime television See also
dayCompare
nighttime
More examplesFewer examplesThe heat is much worse in the daytime.Our cat likes to sleep in the daytime and go out at night.Can you give us a phone number for contacting you during the daytime, please?It's so dark and gloomy today it hardly seems like daytime at all, does it?I'd prefer a flight that leaves in the daytime, as I'll have young children with me.
